Text.Value: Who was your son's next target?
Shameful to be killed by your own son. That honour should fall to a daughter.
What were you doing when you died?
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

EditorData.NodeContext: talking to a corpse who just said she was murdered by her own son.

Text.Value: Chk. A son who spills his own mother's blood is fated to spill plenty more.
Dwarf... Like me... Dresses in... red...
Found... His secret... My sweet boy... Why...
Where can I find your son?
Killed by her own kid? A damn tragedy, that.
Why did your son kill you?

EditorData.logicalname: Alias (DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED)
Alias (DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED)

Text.Value: My boy... had a secret... evil secret...
Charming. She mustn't have nursed him enough as a child - or too much.

EditorData.NodeContext: Somewhat repelled, Reacting to a corpse saying that she was murdered by her son in a Speak with Dead scene

Text.Value: Filial betrayal, is it? A tale as old as the gods themselves.
It's to be expected - some families just don't get along.
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
Ilmater temple... Didn't see... exactly who...
What does your son look like?
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Slain by her own offspring? A perversion of nature.

EditorData.NodeContext: Somewhat repelled, Reacting to a corpse saying that she was murdered by her son in a Speak with Dead scene

Synopsis: SwD with Fionn Goldgrind, the mother of the serial killer
